fr_FR.description: Ce mod propose trois composants : un pour payer pour se reposer, un pour garder son or entre les parties, et un qui redéfini la mécanique d'arrêt du temps.

en_US.description: This mod features three components: one for paying to rest, one for keeping your gold between games, and one that redefines the time-stopping mechanic.

components.choice_0: Pay gold to rest based on elapsed time (BG1/BGEE)
components.0: Half cost with no added sleep
components.1: Half cost with 4 hours of beauty sleep

components.4: Double cost with no added sleep
components.5: Double cost with with 4 hours of beauty sleep

components.19: Keep gold between Siege of Dragonspear and Baldur's Gate 2
